message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160, which is a fair price for this great product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not sure $160 is the best deal for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.

I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155, which is a fair price considering its value to you is $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $155 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product, which is my final offer.
